data.text:
We loved this hotel. The location was  central and easy walking distance to the sights. Every member of staff was extremely helpful and kind.
The hotel is spotlessly clean, lovely comfortable rooms. The breakfast is amazing. So much choice and I had plenty of gluten free options. I would definitely recommend.
data.title: Great hotel and Location

data.text: This hotel is perfectly situated close to the sights and action of the gothic area of the city.  We also had a long morning walk to and from the port area and up to Montjuic Castle.  The beds were super uncomfortable and hard and the lift was small and slow but the hotel itself was clean and comfortable.  The rooftop jacuzzi and bar closed early which we weren’t aware of before heading up so that was disappointing.  On a sunny day though I expect it would be lovely with the view and seating around.  Free wifi was rather slow but still appreciated having that access.
data.title: Great location in the gothic area

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you appreciated our hotel's location in the Gothic area, allowing you to easily explore the nearby sights and attractions.

We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with the comfort of the beds and the speed of the lift. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we'll certainly take it into consideration as we strive to improve our guests' experiences.

We are glad to hear that you found the hotel to be clean and comfortable overall. However, we apologize for any disappointment regarding the early closure of the rooftop jacuzzi and bar. We will make sure to provide clearer information to our guests about the operating hours in the future.

Regarding the free Wi-Fi, we apologize for any issues you encountered with its speed. We will look into this matter to ensure that our guests have a better internet experience during their stay.

Thank you again for your feedback, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a more enjoyable experience in the future. If there's anything else we can assist you with, please feel free to let us know.

Best regards,

Victor Juanto
General Manager
owner_response.author: Victor Juanto

data.text:
What an amazing stay at this great central hotel. Location was brilliant two mins walk from metro.
On our arrival, we were greeted with a smile and offered a free Prosecco or soft drink.  There were also a supply of sweets and chocolates, tea and coffee to get your sugar fix available at reception. We were given the relevant information and were able to check in as our room was ready ( we arrived early). 

We stayed in room 505, which was on the side of the hotel and was exceptionally quiet.  The room was very well equipped with all the usual including a free safe, fridge, hairdryer etc.. we had a modern coffee machine with ample coffee pods and also tea and biscuits. Two free bottles of water were also replaced daily which was greatly appreciated after a long day sightseeing.
The bathroom was of a very decent size with large shower, lighted mirror, magnifying mirror and copious bottles of “Rituals” toiletries. The fresh white towels were changed daily if required.
The bed was clean and comfortable and sheets were changed regularly. 
Breakfast was between 7.30-10.30 and was taken in the main deceptively spacious restaurant ( be aware this can get busy at certain times).  There was a large selection of both hot and cold high quality food.
The roof terrace was great, had brilliant views of the city and food and drink were readily available. There was also a small plunge pool for the hot days.

The bar and reception is a lovely mix of comfort and efficiency.

The staff throughout the hotel were all very helpful and friendly, particularly Genesis who helped with directions and possible places to visit ie Poblenou  beach and always had a smile.  Alvarez and Sonia also were very helpful and too always had a smile.
We would also like to mention the friendly Michelle and Louise in the dining room and thank them for their tireless efforts.
We would highly recommend this H10 central hotel.
data.title: Exceptional city stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ann,

Thank you for sharing your exceptional experience at our central hotel! 

We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay and that our location, amenities, and service exceeded your expectations.

It is fantastic to know that you appreciated the warm welcome upon arrival, the well-equipped room, and the thoughtful touches like the complimentary Prosecco, sweets, and chocolates. We're glad that you found your room to be quiet and comfortable, with all the amenities you needed for a pleasant stay, including the coffee machine, Rituals toiletries, and daily replenishment of water bottles.

We are also thrilled that you enjoyed the breakfast selection and found the rooftop terrace with its stunning views and plunge pool to be a great spot to relax. Thank you for your kind words about our staff, especially Genesis, Álvaro, Sonia, Michelle, and Louise. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to them!

Thank you for recommending our hotel, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon.

Best regards,

Victor Juanto
General Manager
owner_response.author: Victor Juanto

data.text: What an excellent hotel! The location is perfect, close to the metro, not far from the seafront and in the heart of the city. The outstanding thing for us was the staff, without exception they were professional, pleasant, smiling, happy to help you, courteous and friendly.  The roof terrace is a beautiful space to relax and the ground floor bar is also really comfortable.  We will be back to stay here next time we come to Barcelona.
data.title: Great hotel!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Amanda,

Thank you for your wonderful feedback! 

We are thrilled to hear that you had an excellent experience at our hotel. It is fantastic to know that you found our location convenient and enjoyed the amenities like our roof terrace and ground floor bar. 

We truly appreciate your kind words about our staff and their professionalism, friendliness, and helpfulness. 

We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Barcelona!

Warm regards,

Victor Juanto
General Manager
owner_response.author: Victor Juanto

data.text:
Absolutely loved my city break here. Booking directly got a discount of 5%, was greeted with cava on check in. Room of decent size, comfy bed, luxurious  Rituals toiletries. Plenty of storage space, safe, daily complimentary supply of bottled water, coffee machine (unlucky for tea drinker:) cookies on the first evening. Wifi worked perfectly. Ask for free slippers and bath robe if needed.
Location is difficult to beat, in the middle of the Gothic quarter, just few steps from the Cathedral and literally beside the metro Jaume I station, in easy walking distance to all main sights of the Old town, abundant dining options around.
Cannot comment breakfast as i didn’t take it in the hotel.
Noisy street cleaners awakened me in the early hours of the first night. I wrote a complain through the hotel’s app as i had 3 more nights to go. The problem was solved very smoothly, reception staff went above and beoynd to make my stay comfortable. I packed my things, left them in the room and ventured out. New room on the higher floor in the back of the hotel was ready with my luggage there waiting when i came back later in the afternoon. 
Would stay again with no hesitation.
data.title: Excellent hotel and service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your experience! 

We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your city break with us and that you appreciated our amenities and services. I

It is fantastic to know that you found our location convenient and that you received a warm welcome upon check-in. 

We are glad that our staff addressed the noise issue promptly and that you were able to enjoy a comfortable stay in a quieter room. 

Your feedback is valuable to us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future!

Best regards,

Victor Juanto
General Manager
owner_response.author: Victor Juanto
